name: Spore
description: Sporeâ„¢ is an NFT platform on the Avalanche network and the developer of the hyperdeflationary SPORE currency. Our products include the first mass-adopted cross-chain bridge from Avalanche to Binance Smart Chain, NFT collections to commemorate special events, a next-generation NFT prediction market (in development), and several yet-to-be-announced services that will stand at the intersection of blockspace and physical events and help transition the planet to decentralized living.
